meanings.definition: Make a new master of (a recording) for better sound quality.
meanings.sent1: The music producer decided to remaster the old album to make it sound clearer.
meanings.sent2: The film director plans to remaster the classic movie to enhance the viewing experience.
meanings.sent3: I tried to remaster my singing in the shower, but it still sounded like a cat yowling.
meanings.sent4: She hoped to remaster her memories, but some things are better left untouched.
meanings.sent5: The artist's goal was to remaster the painting, bringing out every detail with precision.

meanings.definition: Improve the quality of (a video or film) by making a new master.
meanings.sent1: The studio decided to remaster the old movie to make it look sharper.
meanings.sent2: They will remaster the documentary to ensure it meets the latest standards.
meanings.sent3: I tried to remaster my cooking skills, but the burnt toast disagreed with me.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter seemed to remaster the room, filling it with joy and light.
meanings.sent5: The sunset appeared to remaster the sky, painting it in vibrant hues.
